Service

Money-back Guarantee

This program is supported by the latest security technology. Users do not need to worry about the security of their funds available in DANA Balance, or those available on Debit Cards or Credit Cards. In fact, DANA will provide a money back guarantee if there is a loss of money caused by disturbances or problems during the transaction.

Secure Data Privacy

This Privacy Policy applies to services provided by PT Espay Debit Indonesia Koe (otherwise known as “EDIK”, “we”, “our” or “us”) and sets out how we may collect, use and disclose your “personal data”, “personally identifiable information” or other personal information (collectively, “Personal Data”) in connection with your access to and use of the DANA application (“Dana App”).

24/7 Live Assistance

DANA Customer Care is ready to help you 24 hours! Now you can contact DANA Customers via Whatsapp chat, you know, TemanDANA. In addition, you can also chat via telephone to send email. Provide information clearly and we are ready to help you.
